title: GR Infraprojects to raise $200 million
description: GR Infraprojects plans to raise Rs 1,670 crore in equity capital through Standard Chartered Bank to fund greenfield power transmission projects. The company, traditionally focused on road and highway projects, is expanding into the power transmission sector as India aims for 500 GW of renewable energy capacity by 2030.
